Text.Page: This place is a death trap. If it's not kumases, it's something worse. I send patrols out and they get attacked by {@LinkCreature:24#5#swift storm lizards}. I feel like I'm risking a mutiny with every hour. If you could thin out those lizards, I'd feel a lot better about sending my people on patrols.
Oh, you're good. Look at all these claws! This ought to inspire my troops.
